meanings.definition: The basic monetary unit of Russia.
meanings.sent1: In Russia, people use roubles to buy things.
meanings.sent2: I exchanged my dollars for roubles at the bank.
meanings.sent3: The cat thought the shiny roubles were toys to play with.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was worth a million roubles.
meanings.sent5: The sound of roubles clinking in the jar was music to his ears.

meanings.definition: A sum of money in Russian currency.
meanings.sent1: He saved up all his roubles to buy a new bicycle.
meanings.sent2: The price of the painting was quoted in roubles.
meanings.sent3: The magician pulled a rabbit out of his hat, along with a handful of roubles.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was worth more than a bag full of roubles.
meanings.sent5: The beggar's eyes lit up when he saw the generous donation of roubles.
